title: Strategic Partnership in Skeletal Muscle Biology
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: A postdoc from a partner institute in India who was funded through this grant was able to perform research in a UK laboratory and then use this to secure a job at a biotech company in Cambridge. The impact in this case is that a skilled research scientist was recruited to the UK marketplace to the benefit of a UK company. Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Economic
findingsText: A collaborator of a partner for this grant has secured funding from the Wellcome Trust to research the onset of diabetes and how this linked to diet and metabolism in India. This arose as a consequence of her collaboration with the UK partner who used the funds to travel to India and establish this interaction. no Healthcare
